comments:
Build 20020214

On project org.eclipse.jdt.core.tests, opening the Debugger Source Lookup 
properties results in the following JavaModelException:

Additional info: this happened after I upgraded my jdk1.4 on disk. It appears 
that the new version of jdk1.4 I'm using doesn't contain a src.jar as the old 
one did. As I didn't change the 'Installed JRE' itself, it was assuming that 
the src.jar was still present.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 10096 ***
